      • getUrlBytes

        public static byte[] getUrlBytes(java.lang.String iUrlSg)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Establishes a connection to the provided url and returns the data available there as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        iUrlSg - The url to read from
        Returns:
        An array of bytes that have been read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getUrlString

        public static java.lang.String getUrlString(java.lang.String iUrlSg)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Uses @ref getUrlBytes to read data from a URL, then tranforms this byte data to a String
        Parameters:
        iUrlSg - The URL forwarded to @ref getUrlBytes
        Returns:
        A text String with the data read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
